text: Category:Supermarkets of the United States Category:2007 establishments in the United States Category:2015 disestablishments in the United States Fresh & Easy was a chain of grocery stores in the Western United States. It was headquartered in El Segundo, California. It was a subsidiary of Tesco until November 2013. It was founded in 2007. On October 21, 2015, the chain announced it was closing all of its stores.
title: Fresh & Easy
